columns.SongId: A unique identifier for each song in the database.
columns.Title: The name or title of the song.

Songs.table_description: The Songs table stores information about individual songs, including a unique identifier and the title for each song.

columns.AId: A unique identifier for each album in the database.
columns.Title: The title of the album.
columns.Year: The year the album was released.
columns.Label: The record label associated with the album.
columns.Type: The category or genre of the album.

Albums.table_description: The Albums table stores information about music albums, including their unique identifiers, titles, release years, associated record labels, and types or genres.

columns.Id: A unique identifier assigned to each band record.
columns.Firstname: The first name of the band member.
columns.Lastname: The last name of the band member.

Band.table_description: The Band table stores information about band members, including their unique id and names.

columns.SongId: This column identifies the unique song associated with the record.
columns.BandmateId: This column represents the unique identifier for a bandmate involved in the instrumentation of the song.
columns.Instrument: This column specifies the type of instrument played by the bandmate for the specific song.

Instruments.table_description: The Instruments table captures the relationship between songs and the bandmates who play specific instruments on those songs.

columns.SongId: Identifies the unique identifier of a song performed.
columns.Bandmate: Identifies the unique identifier of a band member participating in the performance.
columns.StagePosition: Indicates the position of the bandmate on stage during the performance.

Performance.table_description: The Performance table captures the relationship between songs and bandmates during a performance, detailing their unique identities and positions on stage.

columns.AlbumId: This column identifies the album to which the track belongs.
columns.Position: This column indicates the order of the track within the album.
columns.SongId: This column references the unique identifier for the song included in the album's tracklist.

Tracklists.table_description: The Tracklists table serves to associate songs with albums, specifying the order in which each song appears on a given album.

columns.SongId: This column identifies the unique song associated with the vocals in the table.
columns.Bandmate: This column identifies the specific band member performing the vocals for the song.
columns.Type: This column describes the nature or style of the vocals performed, such as lead, background, or harmony.

Vocals.table_description: The Vocals table records the relationship between songs and the bandmates performing their vocals, detailing the type of vocal performance.
